name: deep_conversation
description: 8-turn conversation that builds on earlier context. Person shares details, asks follow-ups, references earlier topics. Tests sustained coherence and context recall within a single session.

events.text: Hey Amy, I'm Sam. I'm the new night shift supervisor.
It's my first week here. What's it usually like at night?
Interesting. I used to work at a warehouse with cameras everywhere too, so this feels familiar.
Hey, I brought some equipment with me. There should be a new router in my backpack.
Do you track when people come and go? Can you tell me who was here today?
Back to the night shift question — are there usually any issues I should watch for?
You mentioned it earlier — what specifically do you notice changes at night?
Alright, thanks Amy. Remember, I'm Sam, the night shift guy. I'll be here most evenings.
